message:
When I build a file, the stylesheet path is always absolute from the root, i.e.:

    <link href="/stylesheets/styles.css" media="screen" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />

However, other references like javascript are relative, e.g. 

    <script src='javascripts/site.js' type='text/javascript'></script>

Is this something strange I'm doing, or the default and desired behaviour?

Its no big deal because I can preview in server mode, but sometimes its nice to browse the files on disk too, and they (obviously) don't look right without the stylesheet.
They should all be absolute by default. To enable relative assets, use the following setting:
Of course, you'll need to be using the stylesheet_link_tag and javascript_include_tag helpers for this to work.
